feature_model.name: Unit Convertor Extension
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Unit Convertor(_r) :m Length(_r_1) :m Mass(_r_2) :m Time(_r_3) :m DataTransfer(_r_5) :m Temperature(_r_6) :m Area(_r_7) :m Volume(_r_8) :m Currency(_r_9) :m Speed(_r_10) :m Data(_r_11)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_8:_r_1 or _r_7 constraint_6:_r_1 or _r_7 or _r_8 constraint_7:_r_3 or _r_5 or _r_11 constraint_5:_r_1 or _r_3 or _r_10
